title: Sorry no vacancy
creator_credit: James Wilhite, Pat Wilhite and Wilhite Productions
brief_description: Reviews the problem of population growth from the perspectives of food production, resource conservation, and the ecological consequences of continued population growth. Narrated by Rod Serling.
